sense.gloss: to leave (a matter, decision, etc. to someone), to entrust (to someone), to entrust (someone) with
to leave (to chance, one's imagination, etc.), to let (take its own course), to let (happen), to give (oneself to something)
to use (money, strength, spare time, etc.) to the full, to use freely, to use without reserve

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓に|まかせる|よ。
sdata.e: I'm leaving it to you.

sdata.j: よかれあしかれ、この↑問題↑↓もんだい↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑委↑↓|まか↓せる|ほかはない。
sdata.e: For better or worse, there is nothing for it but to leave the matter in his hands.

sdata.j: パーティーの↑事↑↓こと↓はみんな↑君↑↓くん↓に↑任↑↓|まか↓せる|よ。
sdata.e: I will leave everything about the party up to you.

sdata.j: その↑件↑↓けん↓は↑成↑↓な↓り↑行↑↓ゆ↓きに↑任↑↓|まか↓せる|しかないな。
sdata.e: You can only let the matter take its own course.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓に|まかせる|よ。
sdata.e: I'll leave that to you.

sdata.j: この↑仕事↑↓しごと↓は↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑任↑↓|まか↓せる|よ。
sdata.e: I'll leave this work to you.

sdata.j: こつを↑心得↑↓こころえ↓ている↑人↑↓ひと↓に↑任↑↓|まか↓せる|のが、↑一番↑↓いちばん↓いいだろう。
sdata.e: It would be best to leave it to a man who knows the ropes.

sdata.j: ↑決定↑↓けってい↓はあなたに↑任↑↓|まか↓せる|。
sdata.e: I'll leave the decision to you.

sdata.j: ↑決定↑↓けってい↓は↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑任↑↓|まか↓せる|よ。
sdata.e: It's up to you to make the decision.

sdata.j: ↑犬↑↓いぬ↓を↑他人↑↓たにん↓に↑任↑↓|まか↓せる|くらいなら、↑全然↑↓ぜんぜん↓↑飼↑↓か↓わない↑方↑↓ほう↓がましだ。
sdata.e: You may as well not keep a dog at all as leave it to someone else.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓はジョンに↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑車↑↓くるま↓を↑任↑↓|まか↓せる|ことはできない。
sdata.e: I can't trust John with my car.

sdata.j: ↑娘↑↓むすめ↓が↑卒業↑↓そつぎょう↓した↑後↑↓のち↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑好↑↓す↓きに↑任↑↓|まか↓せる|ことにきめた。
sdata.e: We have decided to leave our daughter to herself after she left school.

sdata.j: よかれあしかれ、この↑問題↑↓もんだい↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑委↑↓|まか↓せる|ほかはない。
sdata.e: For better or worse, there is nothing to do but to leave the matter in his hands.

sdata.j: よかれあしかれ、この↑問題↑↓もんだい↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑委↑↓|まか↓せる|ほかはない。
sdata.e: For better or worse, all we can do is leave the matter in his hands.

sdata.j: よかれあしかれ、この↑問題↑↓もんだい↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑委↑↓|まか↓せる|ほかはない。
sdata.e: For better or worse, we can't do anything but leave this matter up to him.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓に|まかせる|よ。
sdata.e: I'll let you decide.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑任↑↓|まか↓せる|よ。
sdata.e: I'll let you decide.

sdata.j: ↑任↑↓|まか↓せる|よ。
sdata.e: I trust you.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓に|まかせる|よ。
sdata.e: I'll leave it up to you.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑任↑↓|まか↓せる|よ。
sdata.e: I'll leave it up to you.

sdata.j: ↑任↑↓|まか↓せる|。
sdata.e: I'll leave it to you.

sdata.j: ↑運↑↓うん↓を↑天↑↓てん↓に↑任↑↓|まか↓せる|つもりはない。
sdata.e: I don't intend to leave it to chance.

sdata.j: ↑時間↑↓じかん↓は↑任↑↓|まか↓せる|よ。
sdata.e: The time is up to you.

sdata.j: それはそっちに↑任↑↓|まか↓せる|よ。
sdata.e: I'll leave that to you.

sdata.j: チケット↑買↑↓か↓うのは、そっちに↑任↑↓|まか↓せる|よ。
sdata.e: I'll leave it to you to buy the tickets.
